abstract: gregg popovich has hilarious response to historic victory over knicks .
article: gregg popovich is as classy as they come . the san antonio spurs defeated the new york knicks 100-91 on tuesday night , and it was a historic win for popovich . popovich passed george karl for fifth on the all-time win list with 1,176 victories , and is now 34 wins away from pat riley , who is in fourth place . as you can imagine , the media 's focus during the postgame was popovich 's awesome accomplishment , but he was having none of it . vintage pop right here : . popovich , however , did n't want any credit for the achievement , and his exact response , goes as following .

`` i do n't remember scoring any points or getting any rebounds . i certainly would not pass the ball , so i got no idea . does n't mean anything except i 've had good players to coach . '' the man is truly a walking embodiment of class . the spurs have won five nba championships under popovich , and they 're in the midst of another successful season at 26-12 through 38 games . popovich is known for his hilarious one-liners , and his response to his milestone victory is absolutely perfect .
